metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3659 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
[NULL pointer dereference in llsec_key_alloc() in net/mac802154/llsec.c]

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-3659` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.13.0-37-generic - 5.11.0-18.19+21.10.1
linux-image-5.13.0-37-generic-lpae - 5.11.0-18.19+21.10.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.13.0-37-generic - 5.11.0-18.19+21.10.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.13.0-37-generic-64k - 5.11.0-18.19+21.10.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.13.0-37-lowlatency - 5.11.0-18.19+21.10.1
No subscription required
